1.content:
Here are the first 4 story options to choose from:


Addicted
25 year old Laurie Moore has recently gotten herself a new job, a cozy accounting job at a medium sized office building. The once active and outgoing Laurie now has to follow her new schedule, which doesn't leave much time for exercising but gives plenty of chances for snacking. While Laurie loves her new job, she isn't very pleased with her developing habit of snacking. Habit, that is starting to become more of an addiction as time go by.

Fattening Revenge
Hanna has almost always been bullied in school for being overweight, by the lead cheerleader Samantha. But now Hanna has come across a magical object that will allow her to get her revenge by fattening up Samantha and her other bullies. What exactly the object is and how does it work? Will Hanna succeed or will things backfire on her? Let's find out.

Hidden Desire
Liz has moved in with her girlfriend o f 1 year, Abigail. What Liz hasn't told Abigail, is that she is into feederisms and would like to have Abigail gain weight, but now that they're living together she has decided to try fatten up Abigail secretly. In order to succeed Liz will have to be sneaky and manipulative, or she could just be honest, but she might not have guts for that. Liz is a shy nerd, while Abigail is more of an fun loving jock, both are in their twenties.

Spoiled Fat
Alex Hewitt is the daughter to a wealthy business man and a fashion designer, who have been very loose with their parenting. They have let Alex spend money on pretty much anything she wants to, clothes, parties, food, a lot of food. And she has never been punished for the way she behaves, so she has ended up very entitled. But now that she has gotten older, and her metabolism has gone down, her lifestyle is about have some consequences on her body. But with near endless amount of money to spend, no interest in physical activities and very high opinion of herself, Alex might not even care about getting fat.

If these story options don't interest you there will be more behind choice number 5, also feel free to add your own stories to this compilation.
1.title: First set of stories

11.content:
It was just past 6:00 AM when Laurie got up to shut her alarm off. She was still finding it hard to wake up this early. It had barely been a month since she started her new job and she still isn't completely used to her new schedule. After a bit of fiddling with her alarm clock, Laurie managed to shut it off and made her way to the kitchen while pulling her tanktop on.
In the kitchen Laurie turns on her coffee maker and her eyes started wondering towards a box of leftover donuts she had brought home from work yesterday.
"They tasted so divine. But why did I buy such a large box. They are really unhealthy, with all the sugar and the chocolate and the... Mmm... Just one wouldn't hurt. Yeah." Laurie reasoned with herself and picked up one of the donuts. She enjoyed the sweet taste of the chocolate donut while she made her actual breakfast.
Once the meal is done, Laurie enjoys it and has another donut. It would be unreasonable to leave an uneven amount in the box, right?

After eating Laurie goes to take a shower and then begins dressing up for work. She dries and brushes her short sleek brown hair. Then she put on make-up and looks herself over in the mirror. She has a nice curvaceous body, with ample breasts and a firm butt. Before leaving the bathroom Laurie quickly glances at the scale, but decides to not get on it. For the past weeks as Laurie has been unable to continue her workout routine, she also been avoiding stepping on the scale. She has assured herself that she hasn't put on any weight, but just in case she avoids seeing the truth. When she had last weighed her self she was around 110 lbs. While Laurie isn't fully aware of it during the past few weeks she has definitely begun to come softer around her belly.

After leaving the bathroom Laurie put on her white button up shirt and her form fitting black skirt, grabbed her stuff, including the box of donuts, and headed for her car. Entering the car in her car, she turned it on and started making her way to work.
11.title: Laurie's story begins

choices: A silver necklace, with a red gem.
Multiple different colored liquids in vials.
A bag with one or multiple pieces of clothing.
12.content:
Hanna had always been a heavier girl and ever since she started school people have been bullying her for her size. At the age of 16, Hanna currently weighs 244 lbs. She has tried to loose weight many of times but to no success. She blames her genetics for her ever expanding waist line, but in reality the fault might be her large appetite. Hanna has long auburn hair, pale freckled skin and bluish eyes. She has small breasts and most of her weight resides in her belly and thighs. She wear mostly baggy and oversized clothing to hide her body. Her personality has been shaped by the years of bullying and now she is a shy and timid girl, who prefers spending time alone reading. Hanna only has few friends at school, who she became friends with as they were also getting bullied.

Right now Hanna was walking home from school, quite flustered and teary eyed. Right before school had ended Hanna had once again fallen victim to Samantha's bullying. It had been the end of PE and Hanna was in the locker room changing out of her gym clothes, when Samantha had come up behind her and grabbed her stomach. She had then turned Hanna around so everyone in the locker room could see and then started jiggling her belly fat. Samantha had just laughed and made comments on how large and soft Hanna was. Other girls, mainly other cheerleaders, had joined in laughing and some even came to poke Hanna's belly. Hanna had just stood there, horrified and powerless to move. She had never been able to stand up for herself, not even in such horrible situations. When Samantha and the others had finally stopped Hanna quickly put her gym shirt back on and ran away.

Now she was making her way back home, while holding back tears. She was still wearing her sweaty gym clothing, and she hadn't even had the chance to put her bra back on before putting her top on and bolting out. All of this combined with all the other times similar things had happened because of Samantha, made Hanna want to scream and curse at the world and especially Samantha. But she just couldn't. Even if Samantha appeared right in front of her, she still couldn't even say one mean thing to her. She was too afraid to ever stand up herself. But still there wasn't a moment she didn't want to have some form of revenge.

As she walked her mind was too preoccupied, with hatred of Samantha and her own body, and she accidentally bumped into someone. Both of them fell on the ground and Hanna quickly started apologizing, but the other person quickly just stood up and continued walking. Hanna couldn't even discern the gender of the person, as she didn't see their face. Only thing she could notice were the strange robe like clothing the person was wearing.

As Hanna stood up, she noticed a package on the ground next to her. She figured that the other person must have dropped and she picked it up. As she was working out the courage to yell to the person, a feeling of calmness came over her. She didn't know why, but she felt that it would be fine to take package for herself, and she did. When she arrived at her home and went up to her room, she put the package on her desk and started wondering what on earth had come over her and made her practically steal someone else's property. But as she was looking at the package the same sense of calmness returned. But this time her mind was repeating words and names. Specifically revenge and Samantha. And as those thoughts became more and more vivid in her mind, Hanna found herself ripping open the package, revealing the object inside.

It was...
12.title: Fattening Revenge - The Beginning of something Big

124.content:
Opening the package Hanna saw another package inside. Or rather a bag. It looked similar to a bag you would get from a clothing store, but it had no brand name on it. Holding it in her hand Hanna's suspicions were correct, there definitely was some clothing inside the bag.

The same weird feeling came over Hanna, making her immediately start opening the clothing bag to see what was on the inside. She wasn't sure why but for some reason she had to know what was in the bag. With her lack of self-confidence Hanna has never been that interested in fashion, but now something was filling her mind with intrigue. Intrigue and the though of revenge.

In the bag Hanna found...
124.title: A bag with one or multiple pieces of clothing.

15.content:
Strange New Town, Strange New Life
After a divorce Janice Amber moved with her two daughters, Miley and Chrissie, to a remote, not so little, little town called Sweetwater. The 42 year old Janice is not the smartest person, but is still a loving and a caring parent and moved to Sweetwater, because she heard there were good job opportunities there. A job is what she needs now that she is providing for two children on her own.
17 year old Miley, who is going through a rebellious phase right now, didn't really want to move but she liked the idea of living with her dad even less. Now she has to deal with going to school in a new town and getting friends here.
14 year old Chrissie has always been very intelligent and not so social, maybe that's why she didn't seem that shaken about the divorce. In fact the only thing she is really focused on is getting a good education, so hopefully Sweetwater can offer that.
One thing that the Amber family will soon find out about Sweetwater is that seemingly almost every woman and girl in town is overweight. Some are just chubby, but more seem to be on the obese side. The town and it's services also seem to be build around this weird phenomena.
Why is the town like this and will the Ambers become a part of the "large" community of Sweetwater?

Candy Store of Wonders
A brand new candy store has opened up in town and everyone seems to be going crazy for it and its products. No-one is really sure who the companies behind this new store are, but what hey can agree on is that the candy tastes amazing.
One thing people appear to be ignoring, at least for now, are the apparent effects of the candies. The candy is very addicting and causes increased weight gain. Some the products also seem to have other side-effects, or maybe they are intended effects.
Follow either the journey of one the repeat customers of the store or one of the new employees or maybe even the mysterious owner of the store.
15.title: More Stories!

choices: they go get something to eat
151.content:
Now girls, I know you might not be too enthusiastic about moving, but I think we really need to leave our old life behind. Getting a fresh new start would help wash away the past."

Janice Amber was driving her car with her two daughters Miley and Chrissie to their new home in a town called Sweetwater. Sweetwater was a fairly small town though somewhat bustling. Few knew about the town as it is located in a remote area far away from any neighboring cities. Janice found it after meticulous searching due to an unpleasant divorce. The lingering nature of the divorce drove Janice to move far away, an attempt to wash herself of her ex-husband.

The female trio family had arrived at town. Much to the girl's relief.

"Uh finally! We were driving like forever!" Miley exasperated.

"Yeah, it was weird driving across an empty terrain for so long." Chrissie added eyes peering into a book.

"Hey now, it may have been a bit of a drive but just look at this town. Isn't it nice and quaint."

Each girl looked out the window on their side of the car. Both seeing various shops and restaurants. Nothing out of the ordinary.

"Oh look girls! There's your new school!" Janice pointed.

The daughters took a good look at the school. Sweetwater High. A rather large building even for a school, but it had a certain appeal to it.

"Well it definitely looks better than our last school. Hate that I'll have to make completely new friends. God! I know no one here! Like nobody." Miley shrugged.

"Look on the bright side" Janice said being the optimist " you'll make a whole new set of friends."

After a few more minutes the family reach their new neighborhood. As they drew closer to their house they passed various neighbors. A couple were sitting in their front yard, a group of boys riding bikes, two young girls walking down the sidewalk, kind of chunky though, a man mowing his lawn, and a heavyset woman watering her flowers. Then half way through the neighborhood stood the Amber girls' new house.

"Wow" the daughters said impressed by the quality of their house.

"Isn't it nice and to think of how cheap I got it." Janice boasted carrying a box.

"The doorway seems pretty wide." Chrissie observed.

"Hey, it makes carrying in our belongings a lot easier." Janice chirped.

The family proceeded to unload their property into their new house all the while noticing just how accommodating their new living quarters were.
151.title: Destination: Sweetwater, USA

1511.content:
As the girls placed their possessions in place, they heard a knock at the door. Certain it was one of her new neighbors, Janice goes to answer the door bearing an affable demeanor on her face.

"Why Hello! Welcome to the neighborhood!" greeted a large woman in a yellow sundress with floral patterns on it holding a pie.

"Oh hello! You must be our new neighbor." Janice addressed

"Shawna Richards, pleased to make your acquaintance." she handed Janice the pie.

"I'm Janice Ambers. Oh and these are my two daughters Miley and Chrissie."

"Oh how wonderful! You're all girls." Shawna clasped her hands. "We just love seeing new girls come to Sweetwater."

Janice couldn't help but notice how fat the woman was. Her stomach was massive, portruding a good couple of feet ahead of her. A huge pair of breasts rested atop said belly, literally pouring out of the dress. Then came her arms, totally bare in her sundress. Flabby adipose smothered the limbs, creating jello-like waves as she moved. Peeping down, Janice noticed Shawna's swollen kankles. The leg fat literally pouring over her feet. The woman couldn't weigh an ounce less than 400 pounds.

"Say this pie looks good." Janice complimented

"Baked it myself." Shawna proudly stated.

"Really? You can cook?" Janice asked

"Oh yes I just love cooking. I constantly bake sweets for the other gals in the neighborhood."

"Really?"

"Uh huh, you could say we all have a sweet tooth." Shawna chuckled

"I can certainly see why. This looks scrumptous."

"Well I'll get out of your hair. I don't want to stop you from digging in." Shawna turned her wide frame, making an exit.

Walking away the Amber girls could watch Shawna's tremendous ass quiver through the taut fabrics of the sundress. Ripples flowing across each buttock and through her thick legs. Above it was Shawna's plentiful back fat. Bulges rolling over one another.

"Damn, she was fat." Miley blurted out.

"Miley!" Janice scolded

"She was abnormally large." Chrissie retorted.

"She was very cordial to us. And it was very nice of her to bring us this pie." Janice said placing the pie on the counter. "We can slice it up after we have dinner."

"What are we gonna do for dinner?" Miley asked

"Well we could go out." Janice suggested.

KNOCK KNOCK

"Hey anybody home?!" a voice called out.

Janice ran to the front door. Finding another woman at the door wielding a tray.

"Hi, you must be the new neighbors." greeted the woman standing at the door.

"Yes, Janice Amber and these are my daughters." Janice gestured to her girls.

"Two daughters! How lovely." She cheered "Thin too"

The woman before her was fairly fat. An estimable 200 pounds. Wearing a tank top and a pair of shorts gave the Ambers a decent view of her body. A sizable belly slightly hung over her shorts. An ample bust created a long cleavage in her tank top. Possessing full arms with a mild wiggle to them were on full exposition in sleeveless attire. The woman's legs were chunky with obvious deposits of cellulite up them. Her weight even reached her face providing her with a supple neck and rounded chin.

"The name's Betty Holland, I live next door with my husband, son, and two daughters."

"Oh a big family."

"It's a good size." Betty handed Janice the tray "It's brownies for you and your girls."

"Oh my thank you." Janice expressed her appreciation.

"Say did Shawna come by yet?" Betty inquired.

"Oh yeah, just before you did."

"You eat her pie yet?" Betty pried.

"No not yet, we're saving it for after dinner." Janice explained.

"Nonsense! Go ahead and have some." Betty insisted "Here you can have some brownie with it."

Betty than grabbed a brownie and shoved it to Janice's lips. Nervous, Janice begrudgingly took a bite.

"Hey how about some brownies for your daughters?" Betty handed a brownie to each girl.

The girls awkwardly accepted the sweets. Each taking a bite.

"Come on girls don't hold back! Eat up!" Betty handed them another brownie each.

"Say Betty, we got alot more work to do, so if you don't mind.."

Noticing Betty's forcefulness, Janice tried to conclude this bizarre visit. Why was Betty so eager for them to eat? Just from one bite, Janice could tell that the brownies were delicious but also different, as if cooked with an extra ingredient. Perhaps it was all in her imagination. Betty seemed friendly enough just a bit intrusive.

"Alright I'll leave you be. Say we got a pool out back, ya'll should come over. We could even have a barbeque." Betty offered.

"Sounds like fun." Janice replied waving Betty off.
1511.title: New Neighbors

choices: Miley starts putting her new room together.
Miley also has a nap to digest the pie.
There is another knock on the door and Miley goes to answer.
Let's skip to later in the day or to tomorrow.
15111.content:
Janice watched as the odd and intrusive Betty walked down the sidewalk waving back to her. Now seeing Betty from a different angle, it was clear that her shorts didn't leave much to the imagination. Janice then closed the door, wondering if there would be more people coming to welcome them, and turned back to her daughters.

"She was certainly a character." Chrissie said while looking at the two brownies in her hands.

"I'm sure she meant well. She must just be excited to see new neighbors." Janice reasoned after wiping chocolate from her lips.
"Also she mentioned her children, that you two could go..."

"So, about dinner." Miley blurted out before letting her mother finish her sentence.

"Oh yes, well like I said before, we could go out somewhere."

"Really. Can't we like just order something"
Miley still didn't like the fact that she had to move to Sweetwater, and right now didn't want anything to do with the town. Now she would rather just stay home. Or rather in her new home.

"If you happen to know the phone number to any restaurant, then sure." Janice said teasingly, fully knowing her daughter was trying to find excuses not to go out.

"I'm sure I can find something online." Miley responded slightly annoyed, pulling her phone out of her pocket.

Chrissie had already finished her brownies and had started reading the book she had brought.

"The larger woman, Shawna, brought us a pie. We could eat that." She retorted while still reading.

"Well, does that work for you Miley?" Janice asked, putting her hand over Miley's phone.

"Sure, sure. As long I don't have to go around this crappy town."

"Miley, honey. Just because Sweetwater is an unfamiliar place, doesn't mean it's... crappy."

"Whatever."


The three Ambers then made their way to the kitchen where Janice then split the pie in three and the girls began eating. The pie was an apple pie, and it tasted quite amazing, pleasantly surprising the Ambers. There also seemed to be an additional taste, perhaps an extra ingredient or something else.

Normally dinners among the Ambers were filled with slight chatting or awkward silence, but now the family was busy enjoying the taste of this delicious pie. But the pie was also surprisingly filling. By the time the girls were halfway through their slice, they were getting pretty full. But still each one of them managed to finish their meal.

"I'll say, that was one delicious pie. I'm stuffed like pig." Janice said while patting her stomach, trying to make a slight joke. "It was long drive here and this pie was a little more filling then I expected. I think I'll go have a little nap."

"A nap does sound good right now" Chrissie added.


Miley watched as her mother and sister made their way upstairs, then she went to browse social media on her phone. After a short while she also decided to head to her room. Making her way up the stairs and towards her room, she couldn't help but note how wide the hallways were.

"You could probably fit at least two people the size of that neighbor in this hallway" Miley thought to herself. "What was her name, Shawna? God, she was fat. With cooking like that though, it's no surprise I guess."

Miley opened the door to her room, which was currently quite empty. Before the Ambers were interrupted by their new neighbors they hadn't had time to fully furnish their new home. Not that they completely could have as the moving company would bring the rest of their belonging tomorrow. But luckily the home had come with some furnishings, mainly for the kitchen and the bathrooms, also each of the bedrooms had bed ready, all seemingly king sized. This had allowed Janice to sell some of their old furniture to get a little extra money.

Miley looked around her barren room thinking about how she could decorate it later. "I could put my posters on that wall, and my desk could go there. That big wall could be where I put my dresser."
Miley walked a bit around her spacious room before sitting down on her bed. She looked a pile of boxes in the corner of her room. "I hope the moving company didn't fuck up and lose my stuff."
She then unbuttoned her jeans and laid back on her bed. "God, that pie was filling as hell. But delicious." Her stomach felt really bloated
Miley glanced quickly around her room. "Maybe I should get started on making this room look good. But I guess I could wait till mom wakes up, or till I don't feel so full.."
15111.title: The daughters want the pie

choices: Owner and mystery woman Wanda Wonder
152.content:
It was just over a week ago since the mysterious new candy store opened in the middle of town. The store, called Candy Store of Wonders or just called Wonders for short, had raised some questions in the community when it first opened. No-one had heard of the brand or its apparent owner, Wanda Wonder. And considering the quality and the amount of original products on offer, there had to be some kind of production facility somewhere. But there was information on where it would be, who owned it or if it made candy for other stores than just Wonders. But all of those mysteries had soon become ignored, as now the only question people had about Wonders was what will I buy next.

Now on Wednesday morning as the store was opening it's doors for business, our protagonist entered the store.
It was...

Mindy Price, a 21 year old employee. Mindy took the job so she could pay her rent, and is very happy with her high pay and the free "samples" she gets. She isn't the most responsible person, as she often comes in late to work and spends money on not the most useful things, but she still tries her best at work. Mindy is a very social person and loves partying. She also greatly values her appearance and always wants to look her best. Mindy is a tall pale girl, with long straight brunette hair. She is busty, but when gaining most the weight tends to go to her stomach. She currently weighs around 160 lbs.

Caroline Hughes, a 30 year old customer. Ever since Wonders opened Caroline has been coming to the store almost every other day. She doesn't know why but she just can't resist coming in and buying as much candy as she can. She works at a library near the store, so it isn't very difficult for her to come to the store on her way to work and back home. Caroline used to be quite athletic and eat healthy but now that she has become a repeat customer of the store she hasn't been visiting the gym and most of her meals consist of chocolate bars. Even in the short amount of time the store has been in town, she has already managed to put on some major weight, but she seems oblivious to her new unhealthier lifestyle. Caroline a shorter woman with dirty blond hair and glasses. She is bottom heavy and that's where most of her weight tends to go. She currently weighs around 200 lbs.

Wanda Wonder, the 42 year old mysterious owner of the store. No-one really knows who she is, but Wanda has quickly become a very popular member of community. Her kind and motherly attitude has made almost everyone in the town like her, that and the different candies everyone is starting to become addicted to. While she acts kind around other, she is a very serious woman when on her own and is very hesitant to reveal anything regarding the secrets behind her business. What exactly is she hiding and is there actually something sinister going on behind the scenes at Wonders? No one knows but her.
Wanda is large darker skinned woman. Her breasts and butt are quite large, but they are nothing compared to her hefty and round stomach. She has long curly hair, that has been dyed white and red like candy cane. She currently weighs around 340 lbs.

Or perhaps it was someone else. Maybe another customer or employee. Or someone else entirely.
152.title: Step into my candy store!

Story of fantasy love for the overweight
153.content:
Angie Mendoza is an up-and-coming food critic, who has been gaining notoriety for her unique way of reviewing restaurants. Unlike other critics, who just sample multiple meals, Angie orders close to everything she can from the establishments she visits and then eats nearly all of it. Some are claiming her reviews shouldn't be valued, as she is nothing more than a fat glutton, who gives great reviews to any restaurant that can satisfy her immense hunger, instead of basing her reviews on the quality of food.. Restaurants on the other hand seem very happy with Angie's tactic, as it brings them good publicity as long as they can keep her fed. Angie never actually planned on becoming a food critic, but now that she is one she is having a blast. Even the fact that she is constantly getting fatter doesn't bother her, as it just means she now has more place for food in her gut.




Sofia was enjoying the cheat day of her diet one night, when she unknowingly made a wish that would affect the whole world. The next morning when she woke, she discovered that women all over the world had fattened up, including herself. Now Sofia, and everyone else, has to figure out how to live in this new world, where every woman is overweight and very very hungry. How will Sofia react to her new body? Will she realize her wish caused all this? And how fat will she and everyone else get?




In the magical fantasy land of Esharia, the elven king is ready to pass down the crown to his son, prince Castien, but on one condition. Castion must get find himself a woman to marry. The problem is that Castion has a secret preference for overweight women. But this far all the princesses and the noble women who have tried to court have been too skinny for Castion and he has turned them all down. Castion eagerly wants to be king but also desperately wants to find himself a fat wife. Maybe he will come across someone fitting his preference or he will be able to convince someone who is interested in him to fatten up or use other, possibly magical, means to get what he wants. Castion doesn't mind if he has to marry someone who isn't an elf or isn't part of nobility as long as the woman he eventually marries is as big as possible and also is deeply in love with him.

1533.content:
(A/N: I blame CKIII for this.)

"You sent for me, Father?"

Silence pervaded the ancient catacombs. For countless millennia, this dark, bleak place had been the resting place for the divinely descended royals of Esharia. The father of Prince Castien, King Aetius XII, had been spending much of his time down here recently since the passing of his wife, his beloved Sophia.

Now, Sophia was not the mother of Castien. Though husband and wife had tried, she was never able to conceive a child herself, and so Aetius had turned to the ancient right of the Royal Mistress. This right, as one might surmise, allowed the king to take a priestly-sanctioned mistress, and in the event the queen couldn't produce a royal heir, his majesty's children with the aforementioned mistress were considered legitimate.

The Mistress chosen was a woman by the name of Theodosia, and though there was no love between king and concubine such as existed between Aetius and Sophia, the two held each other in firm respect. Sophia and Theodosia, meanwhile, became the closest of friends, much to the surprise of many. Castien had been raised in a loving family home, in essence having two mothers, as Sophia doted on him as if he were her own.

Such happiness was not to last, however. Shortly after his 400th birthday, Sophia developed a sore throat. Within a matter of months, lumps began to appear on her skin, and she was diagnosed with the Blight. The Royal Doctors had tried a number of treatments, but in the end, the Queen had succumb to her sickness at a mere 812 years of age. Everyone was devastated, but none more so then Aetius, who had broken countless generations of tradition to marry the love of his life.

The King had all but disappeared from the world. Matters of state were left to the Privy Council and the Prince as Aetius fell to misery. Even after the end of the traditional mourning period, he spent most of his time by his wife's sarcophagus, sleeping by her stone head and scarcely eating. Castien had tried multiple times to see his father, but his Highness' Silverine Guard would not let him past. At long last, however, he had been summoned to his father's side.

Aetius was not as his son remembered him. He seemed to have aged terribly in such a short amount of time. In his youth, Aetius had been a tall, strongly built man, considered quite handsome by all who set eyes on him. Now, he seemed a barely animate skeleton. His once blonde hair had gone grey, and his pale skin seemed pulled tight over his frail bones.

"That I did," the old King responded, his voice a wispy rattle. "I have chosen to abdicate the throne and enter the monastery of Charon."

Aetius had always been a long winded and eloquent man, so the blunt simplicity of his statement was a little shocking. The content of his words, however, was not a surprise to Castien, given his father's actions over the past months. Castien nodded, his eyes tearing up. Those same eyes would then widen in shock at the king's next pronouncement.

"However, the throne shall not be yours."

A moment of silence passed before Castien could at last respond. "P-pardon?"

"Tradition must be maintained. You are unmarried and childless. The risk of the line ending is too great, and so the throne shall pass to your cousin, Mathias."

"You... you're not serious."

"Deathly. Not once in the entire history of our ancient realm has the Prince been unwed upon his coronation. The King and Queen of Esharia are the embodiment of Sol and Luna on Terra. They rule the Heavens together, as the Royals must. And you have rejected every proposal made to you, whether by myself or others. Frankly, you should have been wed two centuries ago, and given us grandchildren while Sophia was still alive to meet them."

Perhaps Aetius had meant his reprimand to be gentler then that, but it cut Castien deeply. "Father, this is utter madness. Mathias means well, but he's a lazy drunk. He'd rather go hunting then do anything approaching work, and spends gold coins like copper tokens."

"Be that as it may, he is the next in the line of succession, and his coronation would not break Divine Tradition. You have ruled well in my absence, and would make an able King, but the religious rites must be maintained." The King paused in silence for a moment, letting his words sink in. Only twice before has a crown prince been denied the throne, and in both instances the former heir was forced into the monastery of Sol. Should such a fate come to pass, Castien would have nothing to look forward to but a life of copying manuscripts. "However, there is one way to avoid your fate."

Castien, now quite pale, was eager for any lifeline he would be thrown. "What must I do?"

"Get married. Obviously."

*** *** ***


"How much time did he give you?"

"Five years," Castien said, swallowing his goblet of wine in a single shot. "When Luna and Sol meet in the sky, and their first daughter Venus passes in front of them."

Morgan chuckled. "Of course your father would pick the Centenary Festival. Well, it is supposed to be an auspicious omen to start your reign on the Gods' Holy Week. Still, that doesn't leave you much time."

Morgan was a human mage who had spent most of her life among the Elves. Mages live an exceptionally long time compared to other humans, and so she tended to feel more comfortable with the longer lived races. Already almost 500 years old, the raven haired beauty had confided in Castien that she actually found normal humans unreasonably impatient and exhausting to deal with. She had also stated that she was tired of burying friends and lovers from the human kingdoms, hence her move to the Esharia.

Of course, Castien's own theory was that she was just overly fond of Elven wine.

"Seriously, is there not a single person you're interested in?"

"You know there isn't," Castien grumbled as he refilled his drink. Morgan was perhaps the only person who knew the prince's actual preferences. Castien, you see, had a thing for bigger women.

Well, fat women.

Well, really, really fat women.

Somewhat unusually for an elf, Castien firmly believed that bigger was always better, and there was no such thing as too big. Nothing appealed to him like a fat woman totally in thrall to her appetite, eating more and growing more blubbery and useless by the day. His future queen would need to be a big woman, and would have to be comfortable being pampered and enabled into immobility and beyond. Indeed, if Castien had his way, she would eventually grow so vast magic would be required to maintain her gargantuan physique.

Physical appeal aside, Castien also wanted someone intelligent, and fun to talk to. Far too many noblewomen were vacuous and empty headed, more concerned with gossip and fashion then anything of substance. Add in the fact that most ate like birds, and it's easy to see why the prince was struggling so.

"At least your father's not asking you to stick to the traditional bride."

"After he forced the court to accept his marriage to a commoner, it would have been hypocritical for him to insist on it. Still, a traditional bride would be more readily accepted then another commoner."

"So ask Sylvia to marry you, then. It doesn't get more traditional then your own sister. She's really cute, her breasts would put a dairy cow to shame, and you two have been friends forever, so even if love never blossoms, you could at least function. She's always been a terrible glutton, too."

"And a total tomboy. There's a reason she's so thin despite how much she eats."

Much to the disgust of the other races (though some seemed to have... other reactions), far and away the most common type of marriage amongst the elves was consanguineous. Brother-sister was the most common, followed closely by avunculate and cousin pairings, and even parent-child weren't that rare. Siblings were attracted to each other by default as a general rule, and many coming of age ceremonies would double as engagement announcements.

Indeed, his father's marriage had been unusual for a lot of reasons. Many suspected, though not in the king's presence, that it was the lack of proper blood between king and queen which was to blame for their difficulties conceiving. After all, had he not fathered two children off Theodosia, his cousin?

Those who knew the Elves well could recognize hallmarks of the species natural focus towards inbreeding. Particularly inbred lines had their hair lighten over generations, from bright blonde to white. Their ears grew longer and more pointed, often curling slightly at the tips. The women, meanwhile, grew bustier and bustier as the generations passed, leaving the most ancient and pure lines extremely well endowed.

"I still say it's worth a shot. She fancies you, the court would love her, and I suspect getting her fat would be pretty easy, whether you tell her or not. Of course, if she's just not an option, we could look around a bit more. Surely there's someone fat enough for your tastes in the kingdom. Or, failing that, someone we can make fat enough. Well, what do you want to do?"

Anna's first workday of this week was about to start as she entered the engineer's locker room. Looking around she could see the tired faces of the people who had been working the night shift. She opened her locker and begun changing out of her clothing. Being the busty woman she was, Anna was well aware of the feelings she caused in others. Those being mostly attraction or jealousy. Even now she could spot some of the men and women in the locker room looking at her, as she was pulling on her jumpsuit. But, in Anna's mind at least, this made the jumpsuit fell quite comfy.
Anna tied her hair into ponytail, gave quick half forced smile to the people around her and then left the locker room making her way past the reactor chambers towards the room that contained the Food Producer.

The machine was huge, but only apart of it was in the room that Anna had just entered. In the room you could only see a large metal casing, taking up nearly the whole wall it was protruding out of. On it there were a couple of lights, some gauges and some large warning labels. Out of the machine came a conveyor belt that extended to the opposing wall, where it then lead out to somewhere else in the expansive facility. Next to the machine there was a computer terminal, that is used to operate it. Then on the same wall as the machine was on, there was a door that allowed access to a room that housed the actual mechanical parts of the machine. As the Food Producer hadn't had any problems for the last few months, Anna hadn't had any reason to enter that room and spent most of her time sitting next to the terminal and listening to a radio she had brought along.

Anna sat down on the chair by the terminal and turned the computer on. Typing in her access keys, the computer's screen soon opened up the program meant to control the large machine. At the same time the Food Producer led out a booming whirling sound that quickly lowered back down to silence, as the machine turned on. On the screen Anna could see, that the machine had been recently refilled with food paste and was ready to be used. She could also see the list of all the food the Producer was supposed to make that day.

"I wonder why there so many cakes requested today?" Anna thought to her self. "Maybe there is a bunch of birthdays this month and the kitchen staff is taking a shortcut for preparing cakes. Or maybe one those eggheads thinks they can make someone real addicted to cake."

"Well doesn't really make a difference to me." Anna thought as she clicked the confirm button below the list and the machine then started operating.

Anna leaned back on her chair, stretched her arms and looked as the conveyor belt brought along numerous amount of food.
She then glanced back at the computer screen.

"Wait. There's jelly donuts on the list. Man, this is going to be good day."

It took a while but eventually it was the turn for the donuts to be made. And Anna was waiting greedily. She grabbed two form the conveyor. Then another two. Then one more.
This wasn't the first, and most likely not the last, time Anna had taken food made by the Producer. It was something that was actually against the rules, but considering she had no supervision in here and this far no-one had noticed, she figured she could keep doing it.

The jelly donuts, like everything else made from the food paste didn't taste quite right. It wasn't bad, but it wasn't exactly the most delicious either. You could still recognize what the paste was mimicking, but it did always feel slightly off.

"I know it's supposed to be impressive that we can make almost anything from that paste stuff, but it still be better if the food actually tasted right." Anna remarked to herself as she was pushing the second to last donut between her lips.

This far the day hadn't really differed from any other day of Anna's. She would get to her post in the morning, be there for around 7-8 hours doing almost nothing except snacking once in a while, then go have lunch, after which another person would go take her place at the Food Producer. Then she had the rest of the day of and she would either go to the engineer's crew quarters to hangout with her coworkers or just head home. This was her current routine for 7 days a week. There were some exception, but those had this far happened very rarely.

info.description:
This is a brand new compilation of different stories involving different women gaining weight in different ways.
There can be stories of school girls getting fat realistically over long periods of time, magical curses bloating rivaling witches, mysterious infections making a space colony mad with hunger or anything else that your heart desires, as long as it involves women getting fat.

But before we get to the good stuff, let's set some rules and guidelines first.

1) You can set your story where and when ever you want.
Stories can take place at a school, an office, a fantasy world, another planet, a real city or anywhere else. The stories can also take place in any time period you want. The only exception is that the stories shouldn't take place in any fictional world that is from a movie, a book, a game, etc.
2) How the weight gain happens is up to you.
Characters can gain weight realistically and have to deal with the repercussions of getting fat. Or weight gain can happen very rapidly and without any health problems. Weight can also be caused by any means; magical potions, alien experimentation or just by overeating, anything is fine.
But still characters shouldn't just gain a million pounds in one sitting, because we still want people to be able to easily add on to the story.
3) The main character doesn't have to be female.
The main character can be male if you want, but the story should still be focused on female weight gain.
4) Men can also gain weight.
Just like with the rule above the story should still focus on women. But men gaining weight is acceptable as world building or if it necessary for the story.
5) Sex is allowed.
You can choose how graphic you get, but it might be a good idea to give a warning if you go really into detail
Characters can also be straight, gay or bi.
6) Children shouldn't be depicted in a sexual manner.
Characters under the age of 16 shouldn't be depicted in sexual acts.
Characters under the age of 18 shouldn't be depicted in sexual acts with adults.
7) Inclusion of some other fetishes is fine, with some exceptions.
Don't include anything that would change the story from being focused on weight gain.
Nothing overly gross and no bathroom stuff; farting is fine as long as its not excessive.
No vore (this may change in the future).
Also if a character is pregnant, the pregnancy can't just last forever.
8) The characters don't have to be human.
Anything from elves and orcs to aliens is allowed, as long as there are women that gain weight.
Furry characters are also allowed, but they have to be humanoid, so no actual animals.
9) Real life celebrities and fictional characters can be included.
They shouldn't be the main character or be focused on too much. This compilation is for more original stories rather than fanfictions, but still as long as their inclusion makes sense with the story, its fine.
10) Keep the stories consistent
If a story has a clear setting defined at the beginning or a story with many chapters has clear themes, don't just change them out of nowhere.
11) Don't write short chapters.
There shouldn't be any chapters with less than just a few sentences. The only exception is if you are giving more options for choices, but even then you should write at least a few sentences.
12) You don't have to be an expert writer.
A few grammatical errors are fine, but spellchecking is appreciated. Also it would be nice for the readers if your chapter isn't just a long wall of text without spacing. Otherwise feel free to write in what ever way you want.

Hopefully these rules don't seem too strict, as I do want to invite anyone with interest to add their own chapters, or at the least enjoy what's on offer. But now that all the boring stuff is out of the way, let's get started with the stories. ;)
